I'm off :) For a while at least. Thanks to all my sparring partners here at 4Forums: it's been great fun and a brilliant mental workout, and I think I've been inspired to learn a lot in the process. I've not been able to be as active as I'd like recently, so I think a clean break to recharge the batteries is the best bet.
 
 Take care everyone!
 
 Andy C.
